items.title: Israel says it struck near Syria palace over violence in Druze areas
items.description: Israel's PM says it will "not allow any threat" to the minority in Syria after sectarian clashes in which dozens were killed.

items.title: South African woman guilty of kidnapping and trafficking daughter aged 6
items.description: Joshlin Smith's disappearance last year sent shockwaves across South Africa. She is yet to be found.

items.title: Anger as Uganda president's son says he's holding opposition bodyguard
items.description: The bodyguard of opposition leader Bobi Wine went missing five days ago, leading to fears for his safety.

items.title: Chile issues tsunami warning after earthquake
items.description: The warning is issued for parts of the remote Magallanes region after a 7.4 magnitude earthquake strikes off the coast.

items.title: Shein and Temu prices to rise as US closes small parcel loophole
items.description: The online marketplace says it will move to a "local fulfillment model" in the US, with sales handled by locally based sellers.
